John Erik Halse writes:
> +1 for both!
> I suggest that Michael's approach should be used if no encoding is
> explicitly set by the user.

Indeed: the default value for the option can be set based on the
system property. I'm going to make these changes today, since they
just so happen to effect a crawl I am going to start in a day or two.
